TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前可以呈現控制項，必須針對每個控制項中的項目建立物件。Before the control can be rendered, a object must be created for each item in the control. 每次引發事件，中的項目建立控制項。The event is raised every time that an item in the control is created. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，每當建立項目，例如將自訂內容新增到項目。This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever an item is created, such as adding custom content to an item. 同樣地之前,可以呈現控制項，控制項中的每個項目必須繫結至資料來源中的記錄。Similarly, before the control can be rendered, every item in the control must be bound to a record in the data source. 當項目時，就會引發事件 (由物件) 中的資料繫結控制項。The event is raised when an item (represented by a object) is bound to data in the control. 這可讓您執行自訂常式，每當資料，例如修改的資料值，才能顯示這些繫結項目。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever an item is bound to data, such as modifying the values of the data before they are displayed. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您存取引發事件之項目的屬性。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to access the properties of the item that raised the event. 若要判斷正在建立的項目類型 （資料項目、 空的項目或插入項目），請使用屬性物件。To determine which item type (data item, empty item, or insert item) is being created, use the property of the object. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件來存取資料繫結項目的屬性。The following example shows how to use the object to access the properties of the item that is being bound to data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound/CS/ListViewItemDataBoundCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound/VB/ListViewItemDataBoundVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewItem item) cil managed

param.name: item
param.span: 所建立或繫結到資料的項目。

span.span: The item being created or data-bound.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 在引發事件時，這個建構函式主要會由控制項開發人員使用。This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值類別。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of the class. |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||中所包含的物件`item`參數。The object that is contained in the `item` parameter.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As ListViewItem

summary.span: 取得所建立或繫結到資料的項目。

span.span: Gets the item that is being created or bound to data.

value.span: 所建立或繫結到資料的項目。

span.span: The item that is being created or bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取項目所建立或繫結至資料的屬性。Use the property to access the properties of the item that is being created or bound to data. 若要判斷正在建立的項目類型 （資料項目、 空的項目或插入項目），請使用屬性物件。To determine which item type (data item, empty item, or insert item) is being created, use the property of the object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來存取資料繫結項目的屬性。The following example shows how to use the property to access the properties of the item that is being bound to data. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound/CS/ListViewItemDataBoundCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDataBound/VB/ListViewItemDataBoundVB.aspx#2)]
